register then go down hosts/redirects

then go to downloads and pick the one that matches the type
of comp u got

item.dc:creator: @ChrisZ ChrisZ
item.description:
@ChrisZ wrote:

if u got hamachi…

make an network or something

and let them join your network

then let them enter at the ip of ur hamachi

simple and btw when u use runserver

checkl wot its saying (server started on 0.0.0.0 - (port)

the port is important let then change that one 2

if its 43594 then they wont need to…

Good Luck

Pm Me For Your Help

item.description:
@inuyama2 wrote:

if you got your server ready and all port forwarding just tell peoples to log in to your ip.If you dont know how to see your ip press START>RUN> enter CMD>then in command prompt enter ip config and copy your ip.If thats not i can’t help you soz…
